document_data.name: Rildra
document_data.mainbody: '''Rildra''' was a [[Harper]] in [[Scornubel]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: She was a very vicious fighter.
document_data.Activities: Rildra was part of [[Harper]] activities in or around [[Scornubel]].
document_data.Relationships: The Harper was known to [[Marlel]] and to [[Ulburt]].
document_data.History: In late {{yearlink|1357}}, Marlel tried to talk to Rildra while guiding [[Shandril Shessair]] and [[Narm Tamaraith]] through Scornubel. He asked Ulburt to refer them to her, but Ulburt said Rildra had been slain fighting [[Red Wizard]]s, killing one and hurting his bodyguard while armed with nothing but a hairpin.
